text: Hau naunauthauau hadnedasāna nananena Nesethajauhuhauau, hanau nananena hadvāna vadadauchu wauhaunauau nau naneujaudevejechau nau vahee hathāejajāesuu vejechau, nau hadjavechaudauwuna vavesauchuwude nau devechauthade Hejavaneauthau; nuu hāvachunaasedauna, nau hānanejenaudauwuna hauthauau nejesehee.
